fulltext:
CURRICULUM VITAE 
PERSONAL INFORMATION 
  Full name: NGUYEN NHAT THANG   Gender: Male     
  Date of birth: 05-09-1983 
  Place of birth: Ho Chi Minh City 
  Present address: 64/28/4 Nguyễn Phúc Chu, 15 ward, Tân Bình Distr, HCMC 
  Mailing address: 64/28/4 Nguyễn Phúc Chu, 15 ward, Tân Bình Distr, HCMC                    
E-mail: nhatthangnguyen@gmail.com 
  Contact number: 0933229959 
TRAINING AND EDUCATION 
  College: UNIVERSITY OF TECHNOLOGY   Faculty: Electrical & Electronic 
  Major: Electronic & Telecomunication  
  IT Capability: Microsoft Ofice – quite good (Word , Excel) 
  Languages: Vietnamese and English  
PERSONAL CHARACTERISTICS AND QUALIFICATIONS: 
 Inquiring. 
 Dynamic. 
 Creative. 
 Team working/ Working Independently 
 Leadership 
 Training Capacity 
 Planned Ability 
WORKING EXPERIENCE 
From April 2019 to Now : Working as Ho Chi Minh Branch's Sale 
Manager for Altalab - CRMViet : 
 Planning Bussiness for whole South Area 
 Incharge of keeping record of sale 
 In charge of HCMC branch 
 Business train for Sale Dept 
 Enlarge Bussiness Area 
From Nov 2012 to 31st  Dec 2018 : Working as Area Sale Manager for 
Chronosoft Indochina Co., Limited : 
 Planning for brand : KennethCole, Police and Ice watch : sale, stock 
and market 
 Introduce and Sell Misfit and Fossil Smartwatch to dealer from the 
beginning they come 
 Help Customer in selling stock for : DanielWellington, Dannish 
Design.. 
 In charge of keeping record of sale 
 Report to Brand manager about : SO, Dealer, sort out quantity of good 
and bad brand, stock of product, target chart…  
 In charge of Marketting plan for whole month and year 
 Manage SO, stock, Dealer, sale value, travelling time on Excel and 
Conpany’s Software 
 Most important result :  
o Brought Daniel Wellington brand to all Market 
o Well introduce Misfit brand and open some Dealer of brand, open 
to 5 dealer and bring Misfit to TinhTe.vn as a Original Product 
from Distributor. Also help Dealer have mind about Fossil’s 
Smartwatch 
o Build a system of customer from Da Nang to HCMC within 40 
customer. 
o Biggest Dealer : Hải Triều system with Sale Number up to 1 
billion/month  
o Achive target in the last 3 years  
o Contact : Mr.Bien – Sale Manager : 0902399008 
From Jun 2010 to April 2012 : Working as Store Manager for Truong 
Thanh Corp – Furniture store: 
 Manage human and all operations in store  
 Manage quantity and quality of all product in store  
 Manage of  Inventory inflow and outflow 
 Expanding Customer networks 
 Training staff 
 Most important result : Achive all target that company give as 300 
million/month 
From Apr 2009 to Jun 2010: Working as a Retail Manager for Tan 
Dong Tam Co.,Ltd – Cellphone store system 
 In charge of Marketing plan for store system 
 Planning on sales for system 
 Collect business report from Store Manager.  
 Training staff about Communication, Sale method and Product 
 Grow up Á Mỹ Mobile store system. 
 Most important result :  
o Grow Á Mỹ Mobile to 15 store from Qui Nhơn to HCMC 
o Total income from each store up to 500 million/month  
Contact : Mr.Sinh – Vice Director : 0908302279 
From Oct 2007 to Oct 2008 : Working as  a Senior Supervisor for VIEN THONG 
A COMPANY 
 In charge of Human Resources and Operations Management 
 In charge of keeping record of sales 
 In charge of Marketing plans 
 Training staff.  
 Most important result :  
o Build relationship between VTA and Khacten.  
o Achive all target from company 900million to 1 billion/month 
From Aug 2006 to Oct 2007 : Working as Sales Engineer for DAEWON GSI 
CO.,LTD . 
 Sales of Machines 
 Making contract.  
 Checking the system and quality of machine. 
 Installing machine. 
Contact : Mr.Trí  - Manager of Ref Office in HCMC 
     HP : 093 93322 47 
Ho Chi Minh City,20th August 2019 
                                                                        Signature 
NGUYEN  NHAT THANG
